amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $2,500,000 for Navy research and development activities on the Wireless Maritime Inspection System as part of the Smartship Wireless Project of the Navy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4755 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4755 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S8682; text: CR S8682) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $2,500,000 for Navy research and development activities on the Wireless Maritime Inspection System as part of the Smartship Wireless Project of the Navy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4755 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4755 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum.
